Universal tactical forend for AK series weapons Significantly reduces maximum spread when firing. Makes shooting on the run and long bursts more accurate

Can be installed on: UMP-45, M4, L85
A small notebook containing notes about interesting places on the current island. Marks interesting places on the map when used. If not used on this island, it will disappear on the next one

Opens special doors in the underground bunker. Works only on the current island.
Pistol case. It is not known what material it is made of, but it is very strong and heavy.
Gun case. It is not known what material it is made of, but it is very strong and heavy.
Gun case. It is not known what material it is made of, but it is very strong and heavy.

Weapon case. It is unknown what material it is made of, but it is very strong and heavy. It can only be opened with an officer's key card. Fortunately, the electronic lock that recognizes the key card is not broken yet.

Weapon case. It is unknown what material it is made of, but it is very strong and heavy. It can only be opened with an officer's key card. Fortunately, the electronic lock that recognizes the key card is not broken yet.

Weapon case. It is unknown what material it is made of, but it is very strong and heavy. It can only be opened with an officer's key card. Fortunately, the electronic lock that recognizes the key card is not broken yet.
You can fill it with your own blood in case of an emergency. To fill a blood pack, you need at least 50% health. Professional blood transfusion kit. It can be disinfected and reused.
+50 Health Usage time: 6 seconds. Professional blood transfusion kit. It can be disinfected and reused.
The bag contains a butcher knife and a lighter, essential items for survival in the wild. Can be used for skinning, starting a fire and smoking.
The bag contains a butcher knife and a lighter, and an army canteen is attached to the outside. A wilderness survival kit. Can be used for storing Water, refreshing, starting a fire and smoking.

Stops bleeding by applying pressure to the limb. Quick to use, but stops bleeding a little slower than I'd like. Use time: 0.5 seconds. After use, takes away 5 units of health. The number of uses is unlimited.
Shoulder bag. Durable, does not get dirty, is not afraid of moisture. Can store many small items. Ingredient for crafting a survival kit and a first aid kit. (cannot be put into hand slot).
+15 Food -5 Water 50% chance of getting sick if eaten. Can be cooked over a fire. Are you seriously going to eat this? Raw?!
+20 Food +5 Water
Deer skin. Soft and durable. Can be combined with tape to create a repair kit.

The bag contains a blood transfusion kit and a CAT tourniquet. Essential items for providing first aid outside the hospital. Can be used to store blood and stop bleeding. After using the tourniquet, health is reduced by 5 units.

The bag contains a blood transfusion kit and a CAT tourniquet. Essential items for providing first aid outside the hospital. Can be used to store blood and stop bleeding. After using the tourniquet, health is reduced by 5 units.
Can play music recorded on records. A miracle of technology!
A regular frying pan. Time to cook!
+5 Food +5 Water
— Do you prefer apple pie or fudge? — How to get out of here? - Oh, my child, do you want to know about 77 ways to cook snails?
+10 to satiety. +5 to thirst. +5 to health. This omelet is not from these parts.
A regular vinyl record.

Headwear Care Guide. After reading: Reduces wear and tear on all headwear.
Care Guide for Vests. After reading: Reduces wear on all vests.
Garment care guide. After reading: Reduces wear and tear on all outerwear and underwear.
Backpack Care Guide. After reading: Reduces wear and tear on all backpacks.
Guide to wound care. After reading: Reduce blood loss by 50% Slower blood consumption
Medical Guide. After reading: Reduces the time it takes to use medical items by 50%.
Available on day one only.

Botanical Care Guide. After reading: Reduced fertilizer consumption during use. Maximum fertilizer rate: 200%. The possibility of producing fertilizers by processing animal carcasses. You gain experience for using fertilizers.
Gardening Guide. After reading: Reduced consumption of tool strength when planting. More efficient plant growing. Gaining experience in planting plants.
Making a patch: -25 set durability Mending Clothes: -25 set durability; +25 clothing durability
A regular patch. +25 durability

text.name: There is a brown dog living in the cage. There is a beautiful sign on the door: "Wang Shupi".
After reading: Increases health and attack power of dogs.
After reading: Increases the speed of health recovery for dogs.

Xavier "Pilot" Initial equipment: Gorka pants, sweater, pilot's helmet, UMP-45, signal grenade. Unlocked skills: Survivalist (lvl.2), Scout
Xavier "Pilot" To unlock: Find 13 crashed helicopters in one life. On the "Legend" difficulty level
Rudolf "Jager" ☆ Unique skills: Forest Hunter: The meat is even tastier. Treasure Hunter: The map always shows secret locations. Bounty Hunter: For 100,000 points the reward is a "Weapon Case"
Rudolf "Jager" To unlock: Find and kill three albino deer in one life. On the "Legend" difficulty level
Taman "GBR" Initial equipment: Cap, "Orel" jacket, "Orel" pants, AKS-74, Energy drink. Unlocked Skills: Sniper (Lvl.2), Lead Farmer
Taman "GBR" To unlock: Kill a zombie tank with the jeep's mounted machine gun. On the "Legend" difficulty level
Daria "Laboratory Assistant" Initial equipment: work pants, apron, shirt, tetracycline, IV kit, vitamins, adrenaline, bandages x3 Unlocked Skills: Red+ (lvl.2), Sprinter
Daria "Laboratory Assistant" To unlock: Reach the 5th island On the "Legend" difficulty level
